markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Light from Darkness](/Feats.aspx?ID=1391) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 41 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've battled the fiendish power within your nature and come out on top; whatever you decide to do with your life, for good or evil, will be your choice and your choice alone. This struggle has granted you powerful resistance against the divine. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48) effects.
name: Light from Darkness

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 9" pfs="Standard" > Light from Darkness Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 41 2.0 --- You've battled the fiendish power within your nature and come out on top; whatever you decide to do with your life, for good or evil, will be your choice and your choice alone.
